message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you great value. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $8,000?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need $11,000 to make it worth my while. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $9,500?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10,250. Can we shake on it?
Alice, we're getting close. I can do $9,750, but that's really pushing my budget.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,000, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product brings. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but that's my final offer.
